name: Lake city nerd
description:
Lake City's Nerd A game based on tradicional beat' em ups ,

Developed as a conclusion project for the FTEC, Digital Game Desiging course.

Develop Team:

Game Designer - Luciano Souza (souza.luciano001@gmail.com)

Programmer / Animator - Manoel da Rocha de Oiveira (manoeldarochadeoliveira@gmail.com)

2D Artist - Leonel Caller (leonel93souza@gmail.com)

License

This game is only for learning purposes. Can be copied and redistributed. Credits should be given to their respective owners.

Music :

"80s TV Theme" by Yubatake

http://opengameart.org/

"Kick their ass" by Alexandr Zhelanov

https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

"Afterburner" by Paolo D'Emilio

http://www.freesound.org/people/copyc4t/ https://soundcloud.com/copyc4t

"Shop til you drop, dead!"

"The Wrong Arm Of The Law Is Back "

"Gauge double trouble" by Cluster Buster aka Ove Melaa

Omsoftware@hotmail.com

"Cluster Block"

"Disco Is Undead" by FoxSynergy

http://www.freesound.org/

Controllers / Joystick

WASD or Arrows - Movement

Z, NUM1 or Button 1 - Punch

X, NUM2 or Button 2 - Kick

G, NUM8 or Button 3 - Special

ESCAPE - Extra function
